body:
Comment 4: 
This happens because the source file list is showing the file names
used during compilation.  The compilation of the binary distribution
uses /usr/local/go.  If you want to install elsewhere, you can set GOROOT
but that doesn't change the source file names in the binaries' debug info.

The only way to fix the source file names is to rebuild from source in
/opt/go (or with GOROOT_FINAL=/opt/go).

Sorry.
_Status changed to **Unfortunate**._
